mapper.select: SELECT A.REPORT_NO, A.M_NO, A.BD_NO, D.NAME, C.BD_TITLE, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT A JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO JOIN BOARD C ON A.BD_NO=C.BD_NO JOIN BOARDCATEGORY D ON A.NAME=D.NAME ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC;
SELECT A.REPORT_NO, A.NAME, A.BD_TITLE, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE, B.M_NICKNAME FROM REPORT A JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO WHERE A.BD_NO=#{bd_no}
